title: the black screen in champ select + fps drop huge  in patch 7.4 today
body:
problem after you press accept .. you get 20 sec black screen delay as you cant pick or do anything 
the other problem is the fps drop when i team fight happens 
to answer it simply yes 60% of players have it and its from the new patch 
how to solve ?
1- i did lower spec. to very low and didn't work
2-i gone to the old client and didnt work
3-un-instal the game and install it agian and didn't work

replies.body: I have been getting extremely bad FPS recently. I think the counter is also innaccurate. IE it will report that I am gettin around 24 FPS, but in reality it will be around 10. Teamfights are near unplayable. Also, it actually seems like the BEGINNING of animations are cut out the most. It seems like with 20 fps I should be able to notice casting animations, but a lot of the time the skillshot appearing is the first thing I see. Riot pls help :/

I seem to be having more fps lag, and i say seem because the FPS counter is gone. is there a way to get it back or is it art of the patch? either way, having fps issues was annoying in my last game since there was a yasuo wizzing around everywhere, it made it look like he was flashing more than dashing.

I've been seeing quite a few reports on this, and would like to find out if something is going down.  When you have a chance, gather some logs through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.  In the meantime, a clean reinstall might help.  Thanks for the help!
Seriously, im in series for my gold and this just happened to me and caused a loss. Riot, please fix!!! I should be 2-1 in series, not 2-2!
